DirectSharing: Number of agencies listed on the Data Sharing Report or similar document that shows who the agency is sharing ALPR data with
NVLS: National Vehicle Location Service (sometimes referred to as the National Vehicle Locator System) is a pool of data shared among hundreds of agencies, the identities of which are not disclosed A "Y" in this field indicates the agency is sending its data to the NVLS pool.
2016Detections: Total number of license plate scans (detections) collected in 2016
2016Hits: Total number of times in 2016 a scanned license plate triggered a "hit" because the plate was flagged on a hot list
2017Detections: Number of license plate scans (detections) collected in 2017
2017Hits: Total number of times in 2017 a scanned license plate triggered a "hit" because the plate was flagged on a hot list
CombinedDetections: A * indicates incomplete data, often because the agency only provided data for one of the two years.
CombinedHits: A * indicates incomplete data, often because the agency only provided data for one of the two years.
AllTimeDetections: This field only includes agencies that provided aggregate "All Time" data and did not limit to 2016-2017.
AllTimeHits: This field only includes agencies that provided aggregate "All Time" data and did not limit to 2016-2017.
DataSharingLink: Link to the Data Sharing Report or similar record provided by the agency
2016HitRatioReport: Link to the 2016 "Hit Ratio Report" or similar record that shows both the number of detections and number of hits
2017Hit RatioReport: Link to the 2017 "Hit Ratio Report" or similar record that shows both the number of detections and number of hits
2016DetectionReport: Link to the 2016 "Detection Report" or similar record that shows the total number of detections, but not the hits
2016HitReport: Link to the 2016 "Hit Report" or similar record that shows the total number of hits, but not the detections
2017DetectionReport: Link to the 2017 "Detection Report" or similar record that shows the total number of detections, but not the hits
2017HitReport: Link to the 2017 "Hit Report" or similar record that shows the total number of hits, but not the detections
CombinedDetectionHit Data: Link to documents that contain data for both detections and hits for 2016 and 2017 and potentially other records

CombinedDetections: Note: In most cases this figure was generated mathematically. If no information is available for fields E. and F., it is because the agency only provided the two-year total.
CombinedHits: Note: In most cases this figure was generated mathematically. If no information is available for fields E. and F., it is because the agency only provided the two-year total.
